inn1.comm: First ball is shortish, and a touch wide, Sehwag throws his bat at it, gets a bottom edge which goes dangerously close to the stumps
too wide outside off, Sehwag is interested but can't reach that one
Shot! Sehwag gets going with a boundary, short of a length, and a bit wide, Sehwag waits for it and opens the face at the last moment to steer it wide of point for four
outside off, Sehwag leaves that one alone
short of a length, gives Sehwag room to free his arms, chases after it but he is beaten
full and on the pads, Sehwag helps himself to an easy single, glancing the ball to fine leg
short and well wide of off, Tendulkar cuts it through the covers, gets off the mark with a three
overpitched on middle and leg, Tendulkar plays it to short midwicket
short of length outside off, swinging away, Tendulkar plays  slightly away from his body towards cover
width provided, Tendulkar lashes that towards cover, a diving stop from Kapugedera cuts off any chance of a run
slower delivery, Tendulkar looks to flick it but gets the leading edge towards cover
pitching wide outside off and carrying on with the angle, that's been declared a wide
much closer to offstump this time, Sehwag gets back and defends towards cover
tight line from Thushara again, Sehwag blocks it back to the bowler
length ball, pitching on off, coming in a touch to Tendulkar who turns it away to square leg, straight to the fielder, no chance of a run
huge appeal for lbw, slightly short of a length, pitching on off, hits Tendulkar on legstump, that was sliding down
on middle and leg, Tendulkar tickles it down to fine leg

he gets him lbw this time, similar to the one two balls ago, but it was a shade more to the off this time, no inside edge as he tried to play it towards square leg, but replays suggest the ball might have missed leg
slower ball first up for Gambhir, wide outside off, left alone by the batsman
on the pads, Gambhir gets off the mark by working that behind square for a single
gets another single by gliding the ball to third man
on the pads, Sehwag whips it very fine, but the fielder gets around in time, and keeps the batsmen to a single
outside off to the left hand batsman, Gambhir flirts with it, attempts a cover drive but is beaten
close to the offstump again, Gambhir shoulders arms to that one
drops it a bit short this time, it sat up to be hit, Gambhir waits for it and pulls it powerfully through midwicket
retains the strike by running the ball down to third man for a single
slightly overpitched, just outside off, Gambhir tips it towards cover, thinks a single but decides against it
angling across the batsman, Gambhir isn't interested in that one, watches it through to the keeper
fullish ball. on the pads, and that's easy runs for Gambhir, clips it through square leg, despairing dive from Mendis who ran across from fine leg but he can't cut it off
on middle and off, comes forward and flicks it towards midwicket
a touch outside off, Gambhir reaches across and drives that past cover point for another boundary
finishes with a delivery just outside off, Gambhir shoulders arms to that one
outstanding shot from Sehwag, hardly any room to cut, but he goes for the shot anyway, and it goes wide of the third man for a boundary
this time he flicks it towards the square leg boundary, he would have been struggling to complete the second if the throw from the deep had been more powerful
tries to hoick it to midwicket from outside off, he's beaten
shortish ball, again outside off, Sehwag's turns it away towards the midwicket boundary, the fielder has a long chase, batsmen get three
outside the off stump, Gambhir steers it to backward point
slightly overpitched, very wide outside off, Gambhir reaches out and flashes it toward third man, it was in the air for a while but there was no danger of him getting out
Stunning shot from Gambhir, trademark Gambhir, he takes a few steps down the track, and flicks that from outside off to the midwicket boundary
angling into the batsman, defends it towards the off side
guided to third man for a single
and that's been clobbered to the point boundary, that was too short and too wide, you don't bowl there to Sehwag
much better delivery, close to offstump, Sehwag shoulders arms to it
overpitched on middle and leg, Sehwag cracks that one down the ground, the placement isn't too good though, and it fails to beat the man at mid-on
Gambhir walks down the track again, short ball, Gambhir can only defend it awkwardly to the leg side
sharp single there, on middle and leg, Gambhir tucks it away to square leg
back of a length, on off stump, Sehwag punches it towards extra cover
overpitched on the pads, superbly timed by Sehwag who drives it to deep midwicket, superb running again from the Indians, fetches them three
short outside off, Gambhir waits for it and pushes it down to the third man
fullish ball on the pads, Sehwag hammers that to the midwicket boundary
length ball on off, Gambhir defends it towards cover point
skips down the track, Kulasekara drops it short, Gambhir rides the bounce and guides the ball to third man for a single
square cuts a ball that is close to offstump, cut off by the fielder at a wide third man
played with soft hands towards point, thinks of a single, but the fielder is quickly onto the ball, and they decide against it
takes the quick single this time, Gambhir waltzes down the track and drives towards mid-on, sets off immediately
shortish ball, on middle stump, Sehwag punches it back towards the bowler
on the pads, tucked to toward fine leg, the batsmen run the first one hard, gives them ample time to come back for the second
on leg stump again, Gambhir can't capitalise on it though, defends it towards midwicket
Gone! Maharoof has done the trick, angling across the stumps, very tight line, Gambhir tried to open the face and run it to third man, gets an outside edge and gives a simple catch to the keeper
similar ball to the one that accounted for Gambhir, a touch shorter than that one, Yuvraj defends it off the backfoot towards cover
fuller this time, Yuvraj gets forwards and taps the ball back to the bowler
very wide outside off, Maharoof had sent down a very accurate over till then
on middle and off, Yuvraj pushes it back towards the bowler
short of a length delivery, outside off, Sehwag tries to thrash that past mid-off, doesn't beat the fielder
slower ball, short and outside off, Sehwag slogs it over mid-on, doesn't get it in the middle, but gets enough to clear the mid-on fielder
pitching on middle and angling in, Sehwag back away and flicks it to the midwicket boundary
drives it towards extra cover for a single this time
Yuvraj watchfully lets an outside off delivery go through to the keeper
on the leg stump, Yuvraj turns it to deep square leg for a single that gets him off the mark
good delivery to start, length ball on off stump, Yuvraj defends towards mid-off
in the corridor outside off, Yuvraj shoulders arms to that one
almost a replay of the previous ball, Yuvraj is content to let it go again
Amazing timing! overpitched outside off, Yuvraj reaches forward and punches it past extra cover
good reply from Maharoof, back of a length around off, Yuvraj took a big stride forward to defend but is beaten
similar length, on middle stump, Yuvraj gets forward and defends
launched over the covers, Thushara bowl it short and wide, Sehwag pounces on it, fearsome hit to the boundary

Run out, Sehwag's gone! no need for the third umpire even, it started with a superb shot from Sehwag, he picks up the ball from offstump and flicked towards wide long-on, the batsmen pushed for three, Murali was the fielder who gave chase from mid-on, relays the ball to Jayasuriya whose accurate throw to the non-striker's end gets rid of Sehwag, that's a huge blow for India
Yuvraj shows the full face of the bat and defends it solidly
defended back to the bowler again
overpitched on offstump, Yuvraj gets forward and drives it to sweeper cover
good length, outside off, left alone by Yuvraj
Maharoof pegs away at that back-of-a-length on offstump, Raina defends off the backfoot
fuller this time, Raina punches it towards mid-off
defended off the backfoot back to the bowler
going across the batsman, who again defends, this time towards the off side
tries to slog it over midwicket, doesn't make contact though
tries to defend off the backfoot, gets a thick outside edge, well wide of slip, the ball rolls down to third man for a single
back of a length, outside off, Raina carves that through the covers for a single
a touch short, on middle and off, Yuvraj deposits that to the midwicket boundary
outside off, attempts a cut, but doesn't make contact
outside off again, this time Yuvraj shoulders arms
back of a length, Yuvraj drives towards the bowler, it's in the air for a bit but doesn't carry to Thushara
worked towards square leg by Yuvraj, placement isn't very good, straight to the fielder, no run
length ball, on middle and leg, Yuvraj turns it to midwicket for a single
slower delivery, overpitched on legstump, Raina works it behind square for a single
overpitched on off, Yuvraj pushes it towards mid-off for another single
back of a length, on leg stump, defended off the backfoot by Raina
cut into the batsman after pitching on middle, Raina adjusts his shot at the last instant to push it to midwicket
length ball on off, Raina gets forward and defends
strays onto his pads this time, turned towards midwicket
length ball, just outside off, driven to the right of the bowler
on offstump this time, defended watchfully off the front foot
on the pads, Raina flicks it towards midwicket for a single and retains strike
back of a length, on the legstump, Raina plays it uppishly towards square leg, there's no fielder there in the circle, so he's safe
Overpitched, on off and middle, Yuvraj presents the full face of the bat as he drives between mid-off and the bowler for a boundary
slight width provided, Yuvraj cuts but doesn't beat the fielder at backward point
outside off, Yuvraj lets that through to the keeper
full on middle and leg, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
back of a length, on legstump, Raina tries to punch it down the ground, it flies in the air towards the bowler but it lands short
the carrom ball gets the outside edge,  Yuvraj pokes at it, too quick for Jayawardene at first slip
wide down the leg side
Yuvraj gets a big stride in as blocks it back to the bowler
length ball on legstump, turned to midwicket for a single
flighted delivery, Raina shimmies down the track and punches the ball towards mid-off
glances it to backward square leg, straight to the fielder
Maharoof starts off with a wide down the leg side, he's generally been very accurate so far today
a bit of width for Raina to work with, he cuts it in the air towards deep third man, gets himself a single
slower ball on the offstump, defended by Yuvraj
drops it a touch short, Yuvraj is onto the backfoot in a flash, pulled powerfully to wide long-on for a boundary
back of a length, on off, punched back to the bowler
similar line and length, slower ball this time, Yuvraj defends off the backfoot towards cover
strays onto the pads this time, Yuvraj flicks it to square leg for a single
Shot! overpitched by Mendis,  Yuvraj gets on the front foot and launches that over long-off for a six
full, on off, defended back to the bowler by Yuvraj
paddles it very fine, runs away towards the boundary, where Murali runs around and cuts if off, keeps the batsmen down to three
Raina comes down the track, and punches Mendis down the ground, Mendis dives to his left to stop it
glanced towards fine leg
overpitched on legstump, easy single for Yuvraj down to long-on

that nipped back in sharply, landed on a good length on the off stump, Yuvraj came on the front foot to defend, got a thick inside edge onto the pads. Stifled appeal from Maharoof but we all know that can't be given
nicely behind it this time, short of a length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
full on the pads and Yuvraj just flicks it away to deep square leg, well timed
good length just marginally outside off, Raina comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
straying on the pads, turned away towards fine leg, Yuvraj is interested in the second but Raina sends him back wisely
short of a length on the off stump, slapped back to the bowler, didn't time that well, was looking to pull it in the the direction of midwicket
spun away sharply, landed on a good length outside off and whizzed past Raina's bat as he reaches for it
tossed up on leg stump, turned away wide of midwicket for a single
almost! Short and wide, there to cut, Yuvraj chases it but fails to connect.
that kept low, spun in towards middle from well outside leg stump, Yuvraj went onto the back  foot and defended it on the off side
big turn, short of a length outside off and Yuvraj shapes for a cut, the ball spins away sharply and he fails to make contact
flighted on middle and off, gets forward and defends it cautiously to the bowler. Excellent start
offspinner, bowled full outside off, Raina comes forward and drives it all along the ground to long-on
offspinner again, flat on the off stump, defended on the front foot
that went straight on, short of a length on the off stump, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
flighted on middle and off this time, defended on the leg side off the front foot
short outside leg stump, Yuvraj tries to help that on its way to fine leg, misses, and is called a wide. 50 partnership!
flat and quick on middle and off, defended on the leg side
pushed into the vacant leg-side field and Yuvraj gets an easy single, calls for a second but is sent back
tossed up on leg stump and spun in towards middle, defended on the off side
flighted on the off stump, pushed wide of short cover, rushes for a single and had the fielder thrown down the stumps at the non-striker's end, Yuvraj was gone!
tossed up on the off stump, pushed off the front foot into the off side
flat and quick, full on the off stump, driven firmly down the ground to long-off
testing line outside off stump, thrown up this time and Yuvraj, unlike the previous over where he chased a wide ball, leaves it alone
tossed up on the off stump, comes down the track and strokes it to long-off
straight one, good length on the off stump, spots it and pushes it to cover
offspinner, fuller on middle, defended on the leg side
much slower through the air and Yuvraj fails to pick it, shapes up for a paddle down to fine leg, hits the handle and lands in front of cover
short on the off stump, punched off the back foot to long-off
flighted on the off stump, comes forward and drives it down to long-on
pushed in quicker on leg stump, worked away to fine leg
tossed up on middle and spinning towards off, Yuvraj covers it well by lunging forward to defend
flighted on middle and off, defended on the front foot
flighted outside off, driven to deep cover off the front foot
short on leg stump, tucked away wide of square leg for a single
flighted on the off stump, drags it towards fine leg with a perfectly executed sweep
they're handling him well here, tossed up on the off stump, Raina is down the track and he pushes it firmly to long-off
big one!! What a welcome! Bowled flat and full on the off stump, Raina gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps it well over the midwicket boundary
flighted, bowled almost on a yorker length outside off, dug out wide of the bowler towards long off
worked away behind square leg
flat and full on the off stump, Yuvraj is down the track and drives it along the ground to long-off
flighted on middle and leg, driven to long-on off the front foot
struck firmly to cover off the front foot, failed to beat the fielder there
short on leg stump, slapped back past the bowler towards long-on
flighted on leg stump, defended watchfully on the leg side
flatter on the off stump, comes down the track but is not to the pitch, just pushes it away to cover
doosra, spotted well by Yuvraj, stays his ground and defends it on the off side
comes down the track even before the ball is bowled, Murali spots him and fires it a touch outside off, the ball spins away sharply but Yuvraj reaches it in time and guides it to point

shot! Meaty ball bowled on a length outside off, Yuvraj reaches forward and plays a textbook cover-drive wide of the short cover fielder for a boundary. That raced to the fence. It also brings up his fifty
short on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up on leg stump, pushed wide of square leg for a single
short on middle, pulled away powerfully, but straight to midwicket
down the track and pushes it wide of cover for a single
chipped uppishly wide of cover, bowled on a good length outside off
swept away to deep square leg, tossed up on middle and off and Yuvraj covers the spin well
he uses the sweep again, flighted on leg stump and it's a bread and butter shot for Yuvraj who places it wide of deep square leg for a couple
short of a good length outside leg stump, gets forward and is struck high on the pads
quicker and much flatter outside off, sharp spin away from the batsman and some good bounce too, Yuvraj waits for it and opens the face at the last moment to guide it past slip for three runs.
flighted on middle and leg, driven to midwicket
short outside off, cut away towards deep cover
flighted outside off, driven firmly but straight to cover

gone! Dilshan strikes! Landed short on the off stump and gets some extra bounce, surprising the batsman, it also stops on him and Raina dabs at it hard off the back foot, the ball hits the high end of the bat and lobs up to short cover where Kapugedara takes a dolly
short on the off stump, pushed firmly to long-on off the back foot
flighted outside leg stump and is swept really fine, through Murali at short-fine for a boundary
flighted on middle and off, lands short of a good length , Yuvraj is down the track and defends on the off side
worked away wide of square leg for a single
some good bounce again, short of a length on the off stump and spins in sharply, Dhoni defends it well off the back foot
tossed up on middle, Yuvraj charges down and drives that along the ground to long-off
tossed up on the off stump, defended watchfully towards cover
flighted on middle and leg, turned away wide of square leg
short of a length on middle and off, Yuvraj chops it wide of cover off the back foot
flighted on leg stump, driven to long-on
quicker through the air, fired on middle, pushed into the off side wide of cover for  a quick single
false start, down the leg side, Yuvraj tries to glance it down fine, fails to make contact

gone!! Now is that out?? No. Short of a good length on middle and off, gets on the back foot to work it away towards square leg, gets a big inside edge onto the pads that the umpire fails to spot. He raises his finger after quite some time and Yuvraj is understandably distraught
full on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover
good length on the off stump, pushed wide of cover off the front foot
full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler off the front foot
short of a length outside off, run down to third man for a single
good length on middle and leg, pushed to mid-off and then set off for a single, Mendis the fielder there concedes an overthrow while aiming at the stumps at the striker's end
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket, decide against the single
quicker ball bowled full outside off, defended off the front foot
flighted on middle and off, gets a thick outside edge wide of point as he gets forward to defend
full on middle, worked away wide of midwicket for an easy single
quicker ball bowled on a good length outside off, went straight on, Yusuf tries to defend that off the front foot, got a thick inside edge onto his pads
flighted outside off, opens the face slightly to place it past point for a single
appalling fielding at mid-off by Kandamby, full outside off and driven straight to him, he's nicely behind it but it ricochets off his fingers to the boundary
good length outside off, steered to point off the back foot
full on the pads, flicked away nicely to deep square leg
full on middle and leg, pushed back past the bowler
short on middle and off, dropped on the off side off the back foot
short of a good length outside off, pushed to point off the front foot
full on the off stump, defended watchfully off the front foot
tossed up on leg stump, defended to midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
fired in quick on middle and leg, flicked away to square leg
going down the leg side but he chases it, flicks his pads
short of a length outside off, he bunts it past point from the crease
the straight one, lands on a good length on the off stump, paddled down to fine leg
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to long-on
short on middle and leg, tucked away wide of square leg for a single
tossed up on middle and off, pushed off the back foot to cover
flighted outside off and this one's driven firmly wide of cover for a couple
fired in on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
short and wide and cut away from the crease wide of third man for a single. 200 up!
short on middle, rocks on the back foot and pulls it away wide of deep midwicket for a couple
full outside off,  pushed into the deep towards long-off for a single
short of a good length outside off, defended off the back foot into the off side
short and wide, Yusuf waits for it and cuts it away uppishly towards third man

Dhoni survives, short of a length outside off and he walks across to work it away  on the leg side, gets the top edge as he plays the shot a touch too early but fortunately for him, it lands safely in the mid-off region
full on middle and leg, driven to deep midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, the offspinner there, pushed back past the bowler to long-on for a single
flighted on middle and leg, swept to fine leg for a single
the straight one, fired in on leg stump, defended on the off side
tossed up outside off, reaches for it and pushes to cover
flighted on middle and off, punched wide of a diving Mendis for a single to long-off
slower ball bowled short of a length outside off, he saw Dhoni coming down the track and changed his pace at the right time, turned away wide of square leg for a single
slower one again, pushed to point off the front foot
pulled away powerfully and Kulasekara at deep midwicket fails to pick it, bounces well in front of him but he was late to react as he was looking into the sun
fuller on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
short of a length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover
slower ball bowled full on leg stump, he gets forward and pushes it along the ground to long-on
short on middle, Dhoni makes some room and punches that straight to mid-off
slower through the air and spun away fro the right hander, some sharp bounce there as well for Mendis, Dhoni tries to play it off the back foot, gets a thick outside edge wide of point
pushed to point off the front foot for a single
flighted on the off stump, pushed to mid-off. Dhoni a little upset as he fails to pierce the field there
flighted outside off this time, driven straight to mid-off again

run out, pushed wide of cover and Dhoni calls for a quick single, Kulasekara picks up the ball cleanly and fires in an accurate throw at the strikers end, Yusuf stretches hard but is short of his ground as Sangakkara clips off the bails in time
he continues to bowl slower deliveries, this one's full on middle and pushed back firmly wide of Maharoof who dives well to his right to prevent a run
short on middle, defended off the back foot to the bowler
slower ball on the legs this time, pushed short of mid-on for an easy single.
short of a good length outside off, guided to point off the back foot
good tight bowling, slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, Zaheer defends it on the off side
slow full toss on the off stump, Zaheer pushes it to long-off off the front foot
tossed up outside leg stump, Zaheer is hit on the pads as he tries to play it on the on side
goes for the reverse-sweep against Murali, fails to connect well, ends up going straight to point
tossed up on middle and off, defended off the back foot on the off side
slogs at it, it's full outside off but all he can manage is an inside edge towards short-fine
flighted outside off stump, pushed straight to cover off the front foot, excellent over
and its a maiden, and more importantly, in a powerplay. Flighted on the off stump and Zaheer defends it to point off the front foot
slower ball on leg stump, turned away wide of square leg for a single
slower ball on middle and leg, Zaheer tries to heave it over midwicket but mistimes it for a single instead

Dhoni walks!! That was bowled outside leg stump and Dhoni tried to glance it down fine, got a faint tickle to the keeper which the umpire failed to spot. Dhoni, though, set off for the pavilion immediately and Brian Jerling gave the nod seeing him go
short on middle and leg, defended off the back foot to the bowler
slower ball on middle stump which Praveen defends cautiously back to the bowler
misdirected slower one this time, down the leg side and is promptly given a wide
fuller on the off stump, pushed back to Mahroof who dives full length to his right to prevent a run
the doosra, pitched short outside off and spun away, Zaheer spotted it and pushed it wide of cover for a single
fuller outside off and spinning into Kumar, defends it back to Murali off the back foot
tossed up outside leg, tries to work it away fine, clips the pads on the way to short-fine
on middle and off, Zaheer reaches for it and sweeps it down to deep midwicket
short on middle and leg, turned away behind square

the doosra, pitched fractionally outside leg stump and spun into Zaheer, he tries to push that wide of midwicket, misses, and is struck on the pads. Huge appeal turned down as that pitched outside leg
short of a length outside off, pulled away straight to midwicket
finally, fuller outside off stump, Praveen stays his ground and lofts it between deep cover and long-off for an important boundary
on the stumps, a length ball, Praveen squeezes it wide of cover for a single
full and wide outside off, a touch too wide, swings at it wildly, fails to make contact
length ball again and Zaheer connects well this time, it's on the off stump, he takes a couple of steps forward and heaves that over deep midwicket for a big one
full outside off again and creamed straight to cover
the straighter one, short outside off, there to cut, Praveen goes for it but makes no contact
Praveen struggling to read Mendis here, pushed in quicker outside off again, it's short and he plays inside the line expecting it to spin into him, it goes the other way and he's completely deceived
short outside off, the straighter one again, edged wide of point for a single
tossed on middle and leg, Zaheer launches into that one looking to deposit it over long-on, mistimes it, the ball lands safely and the batsmen scramble a single
pushed off the back foot wide of cover for a quick single
full and wide, driven to a widish long-off from the crease for a single
full toss on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-off
yorker outside off, Praveen fails to get his bat down in time.
full toss above waist height, Praveen dabs that wide of cover for a single. Given a no-ball, but no freehit as he's not overstepped
on target, fires in a yorker on leg stump, Zaheer digs it out wide of the bowler and steals a single
low full toss outside off, makes room and drives that wide of Maharoof at deep cover for a couple
full toss on middle this time, chipped towards long-on for a single. Well struck but not well placed
full toss on the off stump this time, slogs that wide of long-on for two runs. Signs of urgency but they're not able to pull it off
short on the off stump, struck back firmly past Mendis and wide of long-off, they push for the second and make it back comfortably
a blind slog, tried to dismiss that over midwicket, was nowhere near it
short outside off, pushed off the back foot wide of cover for a single
tries the revers-sweep but can only manage a single for all the hardwork, plays it past point
short outside off and Praveen tries to loft that over the deep-cover boundary, mistimes it completely, gets the top edge that's snapped up comfortably by Jayawardene at cover

Zaheer goes for the big one and for a while it seemed as though he had pulled it off, the cameras lost it for a bit because it was so high up in the air, was certainly not well timed and Dilshan at long-on after waiting ages for it to come down, judged it to perfection

inn2.comm: Dilshan goes after it immediately, that lands on a good length outside off and goes away with the angle, he tries to smash that through the covers but misses. There's an appeal but replays show there was no nick
landed on a good length outside leg and swung in to strike Dilshan high on the pads as  he tried to work that away towards square leg
down the leg side, moves away further after pitching outside leg stump, good movement here for Zaheer
in the slot and it disappears! Full and wide and Dilshan creams that through the covers for a boundary
full on the off and struck back firmly wide of mid-off where Gambhir dives full length to his right to save a couple of runs
off the mark straightaway, full on middle and leg, turned away wide of square leg, fine leg runs a mile to his right to cut that off but the batsmen have taken three

plays across the line and its effective, on a full length outside off and moving away, Dilshan drags it wide of square leg, Ishant runs to his left and pulls off a good diving stop to keep the batsmen to a couple
good length outside off and some decent movement away from the left hander, Jayasuriya covers it well, defending it off the front foot towards cover
good teasing line outside off and moving away, left alone to the keeper
full on the off stump, driven crisply wide of cover where Raina dives and prevents a couple of runs
short of a good length outside off and swinging away sharply, some good bounce there for Praveen, Dilshan prods at it off the back foot, is done in by the movement
edged but there is no gully, fuller outside off and some good away movement, Dilshan plays through the line, gets a thick outside towards third man
short of a length outside off, chopped down to third man for a single
short of a length outside off, dropped wide of cover and rushes off for a single

gone!! Banged in short on middle and Dilshan goes for the pull, gets the top edge and Ishant and fine leg makes no mistake. Big wicket as Dilshan has been in good form. Well thought out by Zaheer and Co.
off the mark immediately, full on middle and off, he gets across and turns it to fine leg for a single
shot! Full outside off, Jayasuirya opens the face to bisect the gap between point and cover, Raina gives chase and Ishant dives to his left but neither is able to cut it off

short of a good length outside off, a hint of movement into the left hander, Jayasuriya moves across to turn it away fine, is struck on the pads and the fielders go up immediately. Close call, was struck in line but the angle could have taken it down leg. The height was a question too
fuller on the pads, worked away wide of square leg for a single

what a stop! Full outside off and Jayasuriya creams it through the off side, Raina flings himself to his right to pull off a superb stop. He's in a bit of pain there as the ball seems to have struck him at the wrong spot, and Yuvraj rushes towards him to lend some comfort
short of a length on the off stump, pushed into the leg side for a single
on the pads, flicked away straight to square leg
good length outside off and a hint of away movement, gets forward and pushes it to cover
short of a good length on the off stump, defended on the off side
wide down the leg side, short outside leg and Jayasuriya comes down the track and tries to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary. Fails to make contact
bouncer, another wide. It's too high, banged in short outside off
short of a good length outside off, tries to guide that to point, mistimes it towards cover instead
short on the off stump and swinging into the left hander, defended to midwicket off the front foot
short of a length outside off, opens the face to guide it wide of point for a single
much fuller and moving away, defends it watchfully to cover
on a good length outside off, walks across and turns it away wide of fine leg for a couple
short and wide, Jayasuriya would licked his lips there, but it was too far away from him. Given a wide
short of a good length outside off, guided wide of point, Ishant from third man takes some time to gather ball and Jayasuriya quickly scampers back for the second
beaten this time, this one went away as Jayasuriya tried to defend it off the back foot on the off side
nipped back in but Sanga looks in good touch, just tucks that away behind square for an easy single
short of a length outside off, chopped down wide of slip, decides against the single
bouncer banged in short on middle, Jayasuirya shapes up for a hook, zips through to the keeper

how did that miss the off stump? Saw Jayasuriya coming down and changed his pace just at the right time, a slower off cutter that landed on the off stump and moved away as he tried to heave that over midwicket
short outside off, run down to third man for a single
good length outside off and going away with the angle, left alone to the keeper
good start, short on the off stump and Jayasuriya tries to defend that off the back foot, hits the high end of the bat and the ball lobs up towards cover. Hit the pitch hard there

slightly wayward but highly effective, short and wide, Jayasuriya tries to cut that over point, gets a thick outside edge that flies away towards Pragyan Ojha at third man who takes a well judged catch. The bowling change works, and SL have some work to do now.
came back in, good length on the off stump and swinging in towards middle, defended watchfully to the bowler
too wide outside off and Mahela has nothing to do with it, given a wide
moving in, slightly shorter, Mahela gets on the back foot and defends it towards cover
holding its line this time, on a good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
much fuller outside off, pushed wide of mid-off for a single. The captain's off the mark
short of a good length outside off, runs it down to third man for a single
bang on target, on the off stump and hint of away movement, defended back to the bowler

gone! That's an excellent catch! Full outside off and Sangakkara chases it, it was going away with the angle and took the outside edge as he went for the drive. Tendulkar pouched it smartly at slip as Dhoni, who was diving to his left to clasp that, would have blocked his view. Sri Lanka are now in trouble
off the mark stylishly, full on the pads and he flicks it uppishly through the vacant square-leg region for a boundary
watchfully played, on middle and off, defended to cover
full outside off and moving away, left alone to the keeper
full on the off stump, defended off the front foot into the off side
good length outside off and holding its line, left alone
played it with soft hands there, short outside off and opened the face just a little to play it down to gully
short outside off, cut away uppishly but well short of Praveen Kumar at third man
bouncer banged in outside leg stump, too high and rightly given a wide
good length on the off stump, defended solidly to mid-off

dropped, full outside off and he tries to cream that through cover, gets a thick outside edge that flies off over the slips, Tendulkar tries to cup it over his head, gets his fingers to hit, but fails to hang on
full outside off and moving away, defended confidently to cover
on a good length this time, defended on the off side
edged but took his bottom hand off at the right time, the ball fell well short of Tendulkar
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot towards cover
fuller on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
straying on the pads, flicked away to fine leg for a single
short of a length outside off, Mahela defends it off the back foot
short of a good length on the off stump, defended to cover off the back foot
much fuller this time, gets forward and pushes it towards cover
moving away after pitching, hit the pitch hard on a good length outside off and swung away, defended well into the off side
jagged back in this time, shorter on the off stump, defended to the bowler off the back foot
full on the off stump, driven crisply to mid-on off the front foot
full on middle and off, defended to midwicket off the front foot
short of a good length outside off, defended to the bowler off the back foot
full on the leg stump, driven to mid-on
beaten! Good length outside off and swung away just as Kandamby tried to play that away from his body off the back foot
full on the off stump, angling into the left hander, pushed firmly to mid-off
jagged back in but struck him a touch too high, short of a good length on middle and leg and was probably swinging down, he gets forward to defend but is rapped on the pads
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
nipped back in this time, struck Mahela on the hips as he tried to play that towards square leg
slower ball bowled full outside off, at 104.5 kmph, pushed wide of mid-on for a quick single
short of a good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot on the leg side
kept a touch low, on a good length outside off, Kandamby gets on the back foot and guides that down to third man for a single
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to point
short of a good length outside off, shapes up for a cut, mistimes it to cover instead
short on the off stump, pushed wide of Yuvraj at point for a quick single. 50 up!
kept low, short of a good length on the off stump and swung in a touch, tried to defend that on the off side but got a thick inside edge onto the pads
moving  away this time, outside the off and Mahela defends that towards cover
bouncer banged in short outside off, pulled away in front of square towards deep midwicket
full outside off, plays at it with soft hands, gets the outside edge short of slip
on middle and leg, gets on the back foot and works it away to fine leg for a single
down the leg side, short of a length, Dhoni thinks there's a faint tickle but there is none, given a wide
jagged back in sharply but Kandamby covered it well, defended it confidently off the back foot to the bowler
fuller on the off stump, closes the face to place it wide of mid-on for a single
full on the off stump, presents the full face of the bat while defending it to mid-off
and now 22, full and wide, it's there to hit and Mahela gets forward to cream that through the covers for a pressure-relieving boundary
short of a good length on the off stump and moving into the right hander, defended off the back foot to the bowler
lands it accurately on a good length on the off stump and Kandamby pats it back to the bowler
holds the length back a touch and he shuffles and works it to the on side
gets a pretty long way across his stumps to whip that to the on side, he can't beat Yusuf at midwicket
angles it towards the offstump and he pushes it towards cover and asks his partner to stay
takes a lot of pace off the ball and draws him forward, he pushes it back to the bowler
comes round the wicket and angles it on the pads, Kandamby works it away easily to fine leg
comes over the wicket, tries to work it with the spin but gets a leading edge to the off side
pushes it quicker, he gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and checks his stroke as he works it to midwicket
chips down the track and pushes it firmly to long-on
gives it a lot of flight and Jayawardene softly glides it to short third man
plenty of air again and he defends solidly on the front foot
gives him width, he reaches out and slaps it past cover
sharp turn and bounce and the batsman adjusts well as he opens the face of the bat and steers it to short third man
full outside off and pushed to midwicket
slower through the air, he rocks back and clips it wide of midwicket
picks a full delivery from outside off and clips it wide of square leg
gets sharp turn again, Kandamby softly pats it back to the bowler
bounces a touch more and straightens, he makes room and cuts to the off side
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives down to mid-off
Kandamby gives him the charge early, reads the flight well and carves it with the turn over midwicket, he was trying that shot in the previous over
gets forward to the pitch of the ball and works it wide of midwicket
lunges forward and defends
fflighted on middle and leg and he pushes it down to long-off
no turn this time, he turns the face of the bat and steers it in front of cover point and sets off
skids it through from round the wicket and the ball rolls off the pads
gets well forward and pushes it back to the bowler

taps it front of cover and sets off, Jayawardene sends him back and Kandamby scampers back to his crease, Raina fires the throw to Dhoni who whips off the bails, the third umpire takes a look and Kandamby is just about safe
gets forward and defends
gets forward and pushes it to cover point
flighted outside off and defended solidly to the off side
checks his shot and defends
uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and he pushes it through the line to long-off
floated on the pads and he clips it to the on side
decides to open the face of the bat and glide it down to short third,man
chips down the track and pushes it through the line wide of long-off, they pick up a couple
flighted from round the wicket, he gets forward and defends firmly
uses his feet and pushes it through the line to long-off
shuffles across his stumps and works it with the turn to short fine leg
dives full length across the pitch and saves a single, good commitment by the bowler
this time Kandamby pushes a full delivery firmly enough to beat the bowler
shuffles and defends to the on side
uses is feet and checks his stroke, he defends
shuffles and clips it with the turn to short fine leg
gives him the charge and clips it in the air down to wide long-on, Zaheer picks it up
makes room, waits for the turn before cutting wide of cover
full on the pads and worked with the turn to midwicket
uses his feet and pushes a full delivery through the line to mid-on
uses his feet and forces it down to long-on
very slow through the air, he pushes it to the on side
full on the off stump and pushed to the deep on the off side
works it with the turn behind square on the on side
makes room and cuts with the turn wide of backward point, the sweeper cover stops it with his foot and Kandamby scampers for the third run, the throw isn't very accurate
uses his feet and pushes it down the ground to long-on
full on the pads and defends
makes room and cuts to short third man
makes room and chops it to the off side
makes room, waits for the turn before cutting wide of point
moves a long way across his stumps to nudge it away and Sehwag appeals after the ball clips his pads
drops it short and he pulls it to the deep on the on side
good improvisation  by Jayawardene as he waits for the turn and glides it wide of short third man
lunges forward and defends
can't get the single as he defends to the off side
flights it in the pads and he clips it wide of midwicket this time, they need boundaries
drifts on the pads and he works it away wide of square leg
tries to work it to the on side but the ball clips his pads and rolls away
flighted on the pads and he tucks it wide of square leg
gets forward and pushes it to the off side, he can't pierce the gap
makes room and cuts wide of point
flighted on middle and off and he pushes it against the turn to long-on
flighted on middle and leg, defended
works it with the turn to the on side
rock back at the crease, waits for the turn and punches it to cover
makes room and pierces the gap at cover this time
clips it to the on side
tries to force it through the off side but he ends up chopping it down the pitch
this one skids through as he shapes to cut and he misses it completely
makes room and cuts with the turn to the off side
pitches short, turns big, but Kandamby adjusts and bunts to long-on
on the stumps, pushed to short fine leg, Kandamby wants one but his captain shoos him back, he turns and makes it safely before the throw comes in
short and wide, he looks to cut but the ball turns in sharply and ricochets off Jayawardene's gloves and runs fine for a single
on off stump, and pushed into the off side for one
tossed up, spins in and Jayawardene works it off the hips
tossed up, turns away sharply again, dabbed to the off side
gently lobbed up full and Jayawardene pats it back
quicker and flatter, some turn there and stays low, defended
too short and wide, he reaches out to cut it square on the off side
tossed up and defended
tossed up again, bat comes down late and he's hit outside the line
just back of a length and he punches off the back foot to cover
starts off with a short one, Kandamby hops up and deflects it to the on side, Jayawardene sets out of the blocks but gets waved back
pitches fuller and angles in, Kamdamby turns it to midwicket
very tidy bowling from Zaheer, hits a length and Kandamby defends
overpitched just outside off stump, he pushes to Raina at cover
nips back in from a stifling length and Kandamby defends again
and he only gets one, pushing hard and edging safely past gully
full on the stumps and Kandamby pats it back to Raina
flat and drifting down the stumps, he uses his feet and clips to mid-on

pitches short and turns away, Jayawardene frees the arms and dabs the ball into the gap at backward point, Ishant runs after it and returns to Dhoni, who fumbles a regulation take off one bounce and allows a free run
tossed up on the stumps and he defends it back
fired in flatter and he makes room to drive back to Raina
fires it in on the legs, Kandamby shuffles and clips it away
attempted yorker just outside off stump, Kandamby opens the face to try and run the ball toward third man, doesn't make good contact but still scampers a single
pitches fullish and Jayawardene pushes off the front foot to cover
pitches full on about off stump, he flicks straight to midwicket
slips in a bouncer, which is swatted down to deep square leg
full just outside off stump, pushed to extra cover for one
pitches full again, Kandamby comes forward and heaves across the line, the ball very narrowly misses kissing the outer edge, a very loose shot, but at least some intent
tossed up on middle and off and Jayawardene turns it to the fielder

whats this, a six? Jayawardene snaps the shackles somewhat with a clean hit, kneeling down and carting the ball over midwicket for a flat six, the first shot across the ropes for 88 balls ... Sri Lanka need much more of that
uses his feet and pushes the ball into the gap for one
comes out and punches the ball down to long-off
comes out and pushes the ball down the ground, raising his fifty
tossed up and he clips the ball to a diving fielder, well stopped
gently tossed up on the stumps and he flicks it nicely past midwicket, running hard and urging Kandamby back for the second, superb job and the 100th run is up

sharp catch at extra cover! Ojha tosses it on middle and leg, Jayawardene makes room and dances down, looking to go inside-out over the circle, but he doesn't get the desired elevation and finds Yusuf at extra cover, who takes a good low catch to snap a 100-run stand
pushed through flatter and Kapugedera defends
flatter this time, and a touch wide, pushed and edged fine
comes forward and nervously pushes the ball for a single
uses his feet to collect on the full, flicking it toward midwicket
tossed up and he defends off the front foot to cover and runs fast
uses his feet again and bunts the ball down the ground for one
flights it up generously outside off, he gets across and turns it fine
fuller and flatter and Kandamby strides well forward to defend
uses his crease smartly, shuffling across and nudging the ball across the sticks into the opening on the leg side, and that's Kandamby's workmanlike half-century
tossed up wide, Kapugedera reaches out and drives to cover, where the fielder dives and allows the single off the last ball of the over
starts to walk down the track, Ojha spots him and fires it in a little wider, Kapugedera lunges at the ball and gets an outside edge that deviates wide of Dhoni
fired in again and Kapugedera defends it back
tossed up on middle and off and he pats it back
comes out and clips on the full, into the yawning gap at midwicket
gets a good stride in again and turns the ball wide of midwicket
aggression from Kandamby, allowing himself a jaunt down the track, he collects on the full and flicks the ball in the air over midwicket and the sweeper cannot cut it off
pitches down leg stump, Kapugedera waits and pushes to midwicket
even flatter, sliding into Kapugedera, who bunts it to the on side
good turn there, pitching short and almost beating the cut shot
tossed up outside off stump, Kandamby defends off the front foot
comes forward and pushes the ball into the off side
tossed up, Kapugedera comes forward and on-drives a single
short and wide outside off, he makes use of the width and slaps it wide of the covers
cramps him for room but he manages to slash it wide of backward point
gets forward, opens the face of the bat and steers it wide of point
gives him the charge and works it just wide of Ojha who dives in vain, long-on picks it up
shuffles and clips it against the turn to mid-on
makes a bit of room, waits for the turn and cuts but cover point slides and cuts it off
lands it on a good length, he shuffles and clips it wide of square
he gets quite a bit of room to cut but he only succeeds in chopping it to point
short and comes back in, he is a little cramped for room to cut and once again he can't beat backward point
angles it across the right-hander and he turns the face of the bat and clips it to midwicket
fires in the yorker outside off and he squeezes it down to third man
skids it on his pads and he clips it away to the on side, Dhoni gives the chase
fires that short and wide and Kapugedera aims to upper cut it but misses, wide called
tucks him up for room and this time he taps it in front of cover with soft hands and sets off
Kandamby makes room and quickly slices it over backward point, he can't find the gap as third man mops up
walks across the crease and exposes all three stumps, he just manages to clip it away and Ishant appeals
gives him width outside off and he slashes, sweeper cover picks it up
Ishant fires it full on the stumps and Kandamby makes room and manages to squeeze it past cover

Kapugedera finally finds the fence and the crowd gets expectant, he makes room and picks the length early, a shortish delivery is carved over extra cover and the fielder has no chance in cutting that off
aims for the yorker but he ends up bowling a high full toss, Kandamby can only pat it to the off side
one bounce and four, Zaheer overpitches on middle and leg and Kapugedera has a free swing of the arms, there's no long-on in place and he picks his spot
full outside off and he carves it down to sweeper cover, they run the first hard
fires it full on middle and off and he squeezes it softly to point and takes a sharp single
he fails to put away a low full toss, backward point leaps up to intercept a drive
well bowled Zak, he fires in an inswinging yorker and Kandamby does well to get his bat down and protect the stumps
he makes room and cuts a good length ball to backward point's right, Ishant makes the mistake of standing in front of the stumps to collect the throw

edged and taken, Kapugedera charges down the track to smash it over the bowler's head, Ishant pitches it full and gets the ball to move away late off the pitch, Kapugedera fails to cover the movement and gets a thin edge to Dhoni
lucky break for Maharoof, he gives him the charge and exposes his stumps, he swings and the inner edge beats Ojha st short fine leg
jams it full on the pads and he squeezes it to point
Ishant pitches it up and gives him width, that's enough to reach out and carve it over mid-off, not the best looking shot but it doesn't matter how they come
Kandamby gets a little cheeky by shuffling his feet before the bowler delivers but he only manages to squeeze a low full toss to cover point
searches for the yorker and fires it just wide of the leg stump, he tries to paddle it away but misses
fires in the yorker outside off and he digs it out to third man
zaheer fires in an unplayable yorker wide of the leg stump on seeing the batsman make room, he squeezes it out wide of point and it's only a single
comes round the wicket and bowls the slower ball, he swings early and misses and the ball trickles off his pads and rolls to the off side

the ball hits the stumps and deflects for four! This is bizarre stuff guys, Maharoof makes room to a yorker and the ball hits the base of the leg stump pretty hard, the bails move to the left but stay firmly on the stumps, the ball beats the diving Dhoni
makes room and digs out a yorker to the off side
exposes his stumps and places it to the off side

the yorker consumes him this time, Ishant fires it in middle stump straight on the blockhole, Maharoof makes room but fails to get his bat down and the ball crashes on to his middle stump, Ishant says 'thank you' after getting the wicket after Maharoof's great escape in the previous over
fires it short of a length and Thushara glides it down to third man
short again and he just manages to fend it off to the off side

lovely shot, Ishant tries to bang it short on Kandamby and he patiently stays back at the crease and pulls it high over midwicket, Praveen Kumar runs across and appears to have it covered but the ball beats him
fires it full and wide outside the off stump and Kandamby makes too much room and fails to make contact, the umpire is lenient on Ishant as it was close to a wide
now this is getting even more interesting, Ishant's yorker turns into a low full toss, Kandamby makes a bit of room and deftly places it wide of short third man
he heaves a low full toss but fails to get enough wood on it as the ball rolls behind square on the on  side

Zaheer comes round the wicket and the ball slips out of his hand a little too early and it's a low full toss, Kandamby makes room and slices it over mid-off,  not well timed but who cares, it's a boundary for Sri Lanka
big appeal for a lbw, lands on a good length and catches him high on the pad, zaheer is convinced about it but Gamini Silva gives it a leg bye, it  may have just missed the leg stump
full on middle and leg and pushed to the infield on the on side
full on middle and leg and heaved to the on side, can;t beat the infield there
drifts on the pads and he clips it away to fine leg
full and wide outside off, he gets his bat down and squeezes it out to third man
fires a yorker down the leg side and the ball creeps between his legs as he makes room to whip it away
fires it outside off and he punches it firmly past the covers, Gambhir runs across and mops up

the slower ball this time and Thushara doesn't read it at all, he shapes to scoop it over the bowler's head but gets into the stroke too early, Yusuf runs across to his right from mid-on and takes an easy catch
another excellent slower ball and Kandamby is forced to check his shot, Murali sets off but quickly darts back
that's a cracker of a shot, he makes room and cuts a good length ball just outside off and cuts wide of deep point and third man
He makes a bit of room but he can't pierce the covers
slightly slower in pace and Murali intelligently dabs it to third man for a single and gives Kandamby the strike
nice inswinging yorker, he clips it wide of midwicket and Gambhir fires the throw
comes round the wicket, he fires in another yorker and he squeezes it wide of point
excellent save by Gambhir, Murali slashes it hard and beats point, Gambhir does well to slide to his left and cuts it off

Murali first makes room and places it straight to Yusuf at midwicket who spills the catch, he fires the throw to Zaheer who whips off the bails, Murali didnt take off for the run but Kandamby was already at his end, Murali was caught ball watching and in the end sacrificed his wicket
pitches outside off, he goes for a waft and misses
Kulasekara fails to put away a low full toss and Ishant does well to fling himself to his right and intercepts it
full outside off and he swings and misses
the agony increases for Sri Lanka as Kulasekara drives firmly only for Yusuf to dive and intercept it at cover
Kandamby's attempt at improvisation fails as he walks across all three stumps to glance it away but misses it completely, Ishant deserves credit for taking the pace off the ball
very easy for Dhoni, Kandamby makes room to swing but he misses it completely, Kulasekara takes off for the run but Dhoni under-arms ball onto the stumps and catches him well short of his crease
comes round the wicket and bowls the slower ball down the leg side, he sweeps but misses
another bizarre incident with the bails, the throw it fired to Dhoni from long-off, he strikes the stumps firmly but the stubborn bails refuse to move! Anyway the  batsman was just in

lofts the ball just in front of long-off, the throw is fired to Dhoni and this time he hits the stumps firmly enough to dislodge both the bails, there's no need for the third umpire as Mendis is well short of his ground
